result.markdown: --- title: "Week 8: ARIMA models" --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## What you will learn this week * AR, MA, ARMA and ARIMA models * Selecting model orders manually and automatically ## Pre-class activities Read [Sections 9.3-9.8 of the textbook](https://otexts.com/fpp3/arima.html) and watch all embedded videos ## Exercises (on your own or in tutorial) Complete Exercises 1-5 from [Section 9.11 of the book](https://otexts.com/fpp3/arima-exercises.html). [**Solutions to Exercises**](ex8-sol.qmd) ## Slides for seminar Download pdf ## Seminar activities * Find an ARIMA model for the `pelt::Lynx` data [**R code used in seminar**](seminar_code.R) ## Assignments * [Assignment 4](../assignments/A4.qmd) is due on Sunday 05 May.
